Package com.mvohm.quadmatrix

Class DoubleMatrixEnvelopeTest

java.lang.Object
com.mvohm.quadmatrix.DoubleMatrixEnvelopeTests
public class DoubleMatrixEnvelopeTest extends Object
Tests for those DoubleMatrix methods that do not involve actual calculations, namely constructors and getters.
